description:
This ancient Bastokan currency dates back to C.E. 857. It commemorates the opening of the ferry route
between Mhaura and Selbina. A musket and a Galka soldier are portrayed.
name: Byne Bill
note: <Text Color: 11>

description:
This ancient Sand'orian currency valuing 1 noit, dates back to C.E. 491. It commemorates
the Royal Knights and the knights' first captain, Lord Fainevlure Ordelle.
name: Ordelle Bronzepiece
note: <Text Color: 11>

description:
This ancient Windurstian currency valuing 1 mumu, dates back to C.E. 294. The engraving
commemorates the joining of the tarutaru tribes and the establishment of the Federation.
name: Tukuku Whiteshell
note: <Text Color: 11>
